experience.title: C# Project Developer
info: I developed a managerial software. The company asked for a system able to keep track of the locations of all the keys of the places they have under surveillance.
An employer taking some keys is also going to annotate it into the server and sign the process with a touch interface.

experience.title: Frontend Engineer Intern
info: I developed, using React Native, the core functionalities of the Edugo.ai language learning app.
I developed some side features of the core web platform in React.js.

experience.title: Full stack Developer
info: Fully developed with Flutter and Firebase the Idem mobile app.
Idem lets customers of this sandwich shop franchise register they purchases in the app. Clients can receive discounts and offers through the app.
A companion managment app was also developed.
